sentences.en: A age ago I have to go lacking the forego favorite flavor.
sentences.cn: 一年前么有先前最喜爱的风味我也能过.

sentences.en: Here, three Santas forego their sleighs in favor of an underground commute.
sentences.cn: 在这里, 三个圣诞老人放弃他们的雪橇有利于地下通勤.

sentences.en: Keen skiers are happy to forego a summer holiday to go skiing.
sentences.cn: 滑雪爱好者乐于利用暑期假日去滑雪。

sentences.en: Many skiers are happy to forego a summer holiday to go skiing.
sentences.cn: 许多滑雪者乐于放弃暑假去滑雪。

sentences.en: Many top managers have expressed the a willingness to trim their salaries and forego forgo bonuses.
sentences.cn: 许多高管经理都表达了他们减薪和放弃红利的意愿.

sentences.en: Mickey agreed to forego his holiday for the new project.
sentences.cn: 为了新项目,米基同意放弃他的假期.

sentences.en: Mickey agreed to forego his holiday.
sentences.cn: 米基同意放弃他的假期.

sentences.en: Neither women nor men have to forego satisfying sexual relationships because of advancing age.
sentences.cn: 男女都不必因为上了年纪而过早放弃了令人满意的性的关系.

sentences.en: Or else he would forego his mortal nature.
sentences.cn: 除非他能超越那人性的弱点.

sentences.en: The two housebreakers in his cartoon are ready to forego precious stones for precious fuel.
sentences.cn: 画中的两个窃贼正准备放弃珍贵的钻石而改偷珍贵的汽油.

sentences.en: This was a delight he could not forego.
sentences.cn: 译文:他认为是无上乐趣,不肯割舍.

sentences.en: Today forego a grudge. Forgive those who hurt you.
sentences.cn: 在今天,忘记心里的怨恨, 原谅那些伤害你的人.

sentences.en: Well , why didn't you tell me this before we decided forego R & amp; D.
sentences.cn: 为什么不在我们决定超过R & amp; D公司之前告诉我这件事.

words.tran_cn: 过去的；先前的；预知的；预先决定的
发生在…之前；走在…之前（forego的ing形式）
发生在…之前（forego的过去分词）

trans.tran_en: If you forego something, you decide to do without it, although you would like it
If you forego something, you decide to do without it, although you would like it
